text.section: The BOARD shall provide for the voluntary payroll deduction of United Education Professional dues for any employee authorizing such deduction.
Employees desiring to have such dues deducted must sign an authorization form authorizing such payroll deduction.

Dues will be deducted in twenty (20) equal amounts beginning with the second payday in October for all employees authorizing such deduction, provided the Treasurer of the BOARD receives the data necessary to make such deduction prior to September 15th. in the event the necessary data is not timely received, deductions shall commence on the earliest payday possible after the data is received. Any employee authorizing such deduction after the first payroll deduction period shall have the dues divided equally over the remaining pay periods.
